articles.title: Thailand to scrap Covid-19 PCR test for visitors in bid to boost tourism - The Star Online
articles.description: BANGKOK (Bloomberg): Thailand plans to scrap a mandatory polymerase chain reaction test on arrival for foreign visitors from next month as the South-east Asian nation steps up efforts to attract more tourists amid a rebound in global travel.

articles.title: Chinese tech stocks in Hong Kong slip as investors watch Covid situation in China - CNBC
articles.description: Shares in Asia-Pacific mostly declined on Friday after a comeback on Wall Street as investors continued to digest the Fed's plans to fight inflation.
articles.content:
